{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Netgear |model=CG3000D |revision=v2 |asin=B00HC0ZDOE |fcc_date=08/15/2013 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, cable modem |fcc_id=PY313300238, PY3UPWL6031H2 |pcb_id=ACM6383 |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM3383G;BCM3383GB0; |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S34ML01G200TF100 |fla2=1 |fla2_brand=Macronix |fla2_model=MX25L8006E |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B1G1646G |expansion_if_types=Mini PCIe, USB 2.0, |expansion_minipcie_num=2 |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag= |serial=yes,, |wi1_module=Pegatron UPWL6031H2 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCIe (oversized) |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4331 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=3 |wi1_rxchains=3 |wi1_sstreams=3 |addl_chips=Cable Modem LNA;Broadcom;BCM3413;;1; |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Broadcom |sw_model=BCM53124S |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |flags=DOCSIS 3.0, |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.6.30;eCos; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=CG3000Dv2XX |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=password |oui=10:DA:43 |oui_eth=10:DA:43 }} {{TagLine|N450 WiFi Cable Modem Router}} :''Sold as the '''Netgear N450''''' :{{ProductPage|https://www.netgear.com/home/products/networking/cable-modems-routers/N450.aspx}} {{SupportPage|vendor=Netgear|model=N450}} {{â€¢}} [http://www.downloads.netgear.com/files/GDC/datasheet/en/N450.pdf Datasheet]
"ACM6383 REV:2.05A" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. {{see also|Netgear CG4500BD|Netgear|List of DOCSIS Cable Modems}} The board could hold a second Mini PCIe card and has pads for a WAN port :and two phone jacks but these are not populated in the CG3000Dv2 model.
8x4 CableLabs certified DOCSIS 3.0<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=8 |up_c=4 }}
*[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/netgear/cg3000dv2 ''Netgear N450/CG3000Dv2'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
===Likely compatible services=== *{{Approved by service|Comcast}} ([http://mydeviceinfo.g.comcast.net/device.php?devid=395 '''Comcast''' device database entry]) *{{Approved by service|Time Warner}} (on [https://www.timewarnercable.com/content/dam/residential/pdfs/support/internet/twc-compatible-modems.pdf '''Time Warner Cable''' compatible modems list]) *{{Approved by service|Spectrum}} (on [http://www.spectrum.net/support/internet/compliant-modems-charter-network/ '''Spectrum''' certified modems list]) *{{Approved by service|Cox}} (on [https://www.cox.com/residential/support/cox-certified-cable-modems.html '''Cox''' certified modems list], [https://www.cox.com/residential/support/netgear-cg3000dv2.html Details])
